tr_quotes.quote: Ya başlamamalı, ya da bitirmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Emek her şeyi yener.
tr_quotes.author: Latin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşlandığımız için egzersizi bırakmıyoruz, egzersizi bıraktığımız için yaşlanıyoruz
tr_quotes.author: Kenneth Cooper

tr_quotes.quote: Nerede olursanız olun, elinizdekilerle yapabileceğinizi yapın.
tr_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğinize de inansanız, yapamayacağınıza da inansanız haklı çıkarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuza iyi bakın. Yaşamak zorunda olduğunuz tek yer orasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Raux

tr_quotes.quote: Önce biz alışkanlıklarımızı oluştururuz, sonra da alışkanlıklarımız bizi oluşturur.
tr_quotes.author: John Dryden

tr_quotes.quote: Engeller beni durduramaz, her bir engel kararlılığımı daha da güçlendirir.
tr_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

tr_quotes.quote: Kuvvet fiziksel kapasiteden gelmez. Yılmayan bir iradeden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sahip olduklarının toplamı değil, fakat henüz gerçekleştiremediklerinin toplamıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Fitness birinden daha iyi olman değil, önceki günden daha iyi olmandır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Uçamazsan koş. Koşamazsan yürü. Yürüyemezsen emekle. Ama ne yaparsan yap ilerlemeye devam et.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther King

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı yenilgilerin nedeni, insanların işi yarıda bıraktıklarında, başarıya ne kadar yakın olduklarını bilememeleridir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

tr_quotes.quote: Limiti koyan zihindir. Zihin bir şeyi yapabileceğini kestirebildiği kadar başarılı olur. Yüzde 100 inandığınız sürece her şeyi yapabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: En güzel giysilerinden biri kendi vücudundur. Ona iyi bak!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudun neredeyse her acıya dayanır. İkna etmen gereken zihnindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Emek her şeyi yener.
tr_quotes.author: Latin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: İyi şeyler terleyenlere gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vazgeçmek üzereysen neden başladığını düşün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kuvvet fiziksel kapasiteden gelmez. Yılmayan bir iradeden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Motivasyon “başlamanı” sağlar. Devam etmen için “alışkanlık” olmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Önce biz alışkanlıklarımızı oluştururuz, sonra da alışkanlıklarımız bizi oluşturur.
tr_quotes.author: John Dryden

tr_quotes.quote: Limiti koyan zihindir. Zihin bir şeyi yapabileceğini kestirebildiği kadar başarılı olur. Yüzde 100 inandığınız sürece her şeyi yapabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı yenilgilerin nedeni, insanların işi yarıda bıraktıklarında, başarıya ne kadar yakın olduklarını bilememeleridir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

tr_quotes.quote: Ruhları besleyen ve zihni dinç tutan tek şey egzersizdir
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Spora ayırdığın zamanı sağlıktan geri kazanırsın
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İsteme ile başarma arasındaki fark disiplindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mekiklerimi saymıyorum. Acıtmaya başladığında saymaya başlarım. Çünkü saymaya değer olan sadece onlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Muhammed Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insana olanlar değil, o insanın içinde olanlar önemlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Harika bir başlangıç yapmanız gerekmiyor. Fakat harika olmak için başlamanız gerekiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sana bunun kolay olacağını söylemiyorum. Buna değeceğini söylüyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üzerinde çalışacağın en iyi proje sensin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Savaşın ne kadar büyükse galibiyetin o kadar gösterişli olur
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayattaki en tatmin edici acı kas acısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Fit olmak bir hedef değil, yaşam biçimidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğinize de inansanız, yapamayacağınıza da inansanız haklı çıkarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Fitness, birinden daha iyi olman değil; öncekinden daha iyi olmandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Terin sırlı sonuçlar veren sihirli bir sudur, isteklerinin gerçekleşmesi için bu sihirli suyla yıkan.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Engeller beni durduramaz, her bir engel kararlılığımı daha da güçlendirir.
tr_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

tr_quotes.quote: Egzersiz yap, sağlıklı beslen ve sabret. Hak ettiğin ödülü bedeninde göreceksin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Fitness başkası için değil kendin için yapılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sahip olduklarının toplamı değil, fakat henüz gerçekleştiremediklerinin toplamıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Daha iyi bir beden isteme, onun için çalış.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Erişmek istedikleri bir hedefi olmayanlar, çalışmaktan zevk almazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sessizlik içinde çalışın, başarınız sesiniz olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tek rakibin sensin
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir ruh halinden sadece bir egzersiz uzaklıktasın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Antrenmanın sonunda hala iyi gözüküyorsanız yeterince çalışmamışsınız demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kaldırması en zor olan ağırlık kıçındır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mazeret üretmek saatte sıfır kalori yakar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tek kötü egzersiz henüz yapmadığındır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Egzersiz vücuduna “benden nefret edeceksin, ama sonra bana bunun için teşekkür edeceksin” demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yeteneklerini sınırlama, sınırlarına meydan oku.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten çok basit. Yaparsın ya da yapmazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir zaman kolay olmayacak, sadece daha güçlü olacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İmkansız ile mümkün arasındaki fark kişinin kararına kalmıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

tr_quotes.quote: Üstelemek başarının temel unsurudur. Kapıyı yeterince uzun süre ve yüksek sesle çalarsanız, birilerini uyandıracagınızdan emin olabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Pek çok konuda başarı, başarmanın ne kadar vakit alacağını bilmeye bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home
en_quotes.author: Michael Phelps

en_quotes.quote: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united
en_quotes.author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be
en_quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: Fitness helps me think better, feel better, and move better
en_quotes.author: Jason Winston George

en_quotes.quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up
en_quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

en_quotes.quote: The mind is the most important part of achieving any fitness goal. Mental change always comes before physical change
en_quotes.author: Matt McGorry

en_quotes.quote: You can always improve your fitness if you keep training
en_quotes.author: Pastor Maldonado

en_quotes.quote: It's so easy to lose your fitness and so hard to gain it back
en_quotes.author: Alex Morgan

en_quotes.quote: My own preferred fitness regime is to use my bicycle
en_quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is a luxury when you are busy!
en_quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

en_quotes.quote: You can be the most beautiful person on Earth, and if you don't have a fitness or diet routine, you won't be beautiful
en_quotes.author: Martha Stewart

en_quotes.quote: Making fitness a priority will energize you, make you look and feel better, and help diffuse stress
en_quotes.author: Mary Helen Bowers

en_quotes.quote: In my judgment, physical fitness is basic to all forms of excellence and to a strong, confident nation
en_quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addison

en_quotes.quote: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising
en_quotes.author: Tia Mowry

en_quotes.quote: I am not a fitness freak, but I do my regular exercises
en_quotes.author: Uday Kiran

en_quotes.quote: My fitness journey will be a lifelong journey
en_quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: Practice puts brains in your muscles
en_quotes.author: Sam Snead

en_quotes.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

en_quotes.quote: Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning
en_quotes.author: Fred Perry

en_quotes.quote: My job is to be fit and I'm really blessed that I get to go and work out and live a really healthy lifestyle
en_quotes.author: Kerri Walsh Jennings

en_quotes.quote: I swim like a fish and I have an amazing kick
en_quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

en_quotes.quote: I have never taken any exercise, except sleeping and resting, and I never intend to take any
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: The only way for a rich man to be healthy is by exercise and abstinence, to live as if he were poor
en_quotes.author: William Temple

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is not an option. It's part of my job
en_quotes.author: Alison Sweeney

en_quotes.quote: Cleanliness is important, and more than that is the physical fitness to attain healthy body and mind
en_quotes.author: Sandeep Singh

en_quotes.quote: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart
en_quotes.author: Gene Tunney

en_quotes.quote: Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Just as you can't blindly follow fashion, you can't follow fitness, either
en_quotes.author: Anushka Sharma

en_quotes.quote: Fitness, in my opinion, is a mental exercise more than just physical
en_quotes.author: Anushka Shetty

en_quotes.quote: Women have fought so long and hard for our rights and equality, and now all our attention is put on being a size 0
en_quotes.author: Pink

en_quotes.quote: I try and maintain a little bit of fitness, man
en_quotes.author: Frank Bruno

en_quotes.quote: Exercise is labor without weariness
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I consider fitness, diet, and beauty to be essential to a balanced self
en_quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is really important for my mental and emotional equilibrium as well as my physical wellbeing
en_quotes.author: Robert Rinder

en_quotes.quote: Personally, I need a high level of physical fitness in order to feel at ease
en_quotes.author: Jurgen Klinsmann

en_quotes.quote: I do not usually follow a rigid fitness regimen, and most of it depends upon what goals I have in my mind
en_quotes.author: Gautam Gambhir

en_quotes.quote: You must also give mental and physical fitness priority
en_quotes.author: Jim Otto

en_quotes.quote: Find fitness with fun dancing. It is fun and makes you forget about the dreaded exercise
en_quotes.author: Paula Abdul

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is about keeping yourself healthy. This is something you do for yourself and for your loved ones
en_quotes.author: Farhan Akhtar

en_quotes.quote: I take a more holistic approach to fitness than trying to achieve a certain body to display
en_quotes.author: Farhan Akhtar

en_quotes.quote: Exercise is done against one's wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse
en_quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

en_quotes.quote: 15 minutes a day! Give me just this and I'll prove I can make you a new man
en_quotes.author: Charles Atlas

en_quotes.quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy
en_quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

en_quotes.quote: It's challenging, but you have to at least try to eat right and exercise
en_quotes.author: Joely Fisher

en_quotes.quote: The first time I see a jogger smiling, I'll consider it
en_quotes.author: Joan Rivers

en_quotes.quote: I understand only three things - films, fitness, and food
en_quotes.author: Rakul Preet Singh

en_quotes.quote: I don't lift weights. I do fitness exercises to stay strong
en_quotes.author: Chad le Clos

en_quotes.quote: You can't be fat and fast, too; so lift, run, diet and work
en_quotes.author: Hank Stram

en_quotes.quote: The only way you can get match fitness is by playing games
en_quotes.author: Aaron Ramsey

en_quotes.quote: Resting for me is fitness training
en_quotes.author: Jenson Button

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is the most important aspect in this sport. You've got to feel good
en_quotes.author: Mario Gotze

en_quotes.quote: Your body is the church where Nature asks to be reverenced
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Sade

en_quotes.quote: Exercise is the chief source of improvement in our faculties
en_quotes.author: Hugh Blair

en_quotes.quote: I have been through various fitness regimes. I used to run about five miles a day and I did aerobics for a while
en_quotes.author: Sting

en_quotes.quote: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket
en_quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

en_quotes.quote: I try and groom myself, be it through fitness or dance
en_quotes.author: Yami Gautam

en_quotes.quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy
en_quotes.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

en_quotes.quote: I can work hard and be disciplined like a soldier, but I could never reach their level of fitness
en_quotes.author: Richard C. Armitage

en_quotes.quote: Out Of Your Mind Fitness is designed to train the human body to move
en_quotes.author: John Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Fitness needs to be perceived as fun and games or we subconsciously avoid it
en_quotes.author: Alan Thicke

en_quotes.quote: I've exercised with women so thin that buzzards followed them to their cars
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: A feeble body weakens the mind
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: Fitness, defending, the mental stuff - those were all weaknesses of mine. And I turned those into strengths
en_quotes.author: Carli Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: Fitness really changed my life
en_quotes.author: Jon Jones

en_quotes.quote: Muscles come and go; flab lasts
en_quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

en_quotes.quote: I'm really into fitness, so my hobbies are yoga, Pilates, and working out
en_quotes.author: Charlotte McKinney

en_quotes.quote: Oh, and once, when I was in the Marines, I got a perfect score on my physical fitness test
en_quotes.author: Drew Carey

en_quotes.quote: I can't promote fitness tea for the rest of my life
en_quotes.author: Karrueche Tran

en_quotes.quote: Teaching kids about health and fitness is important to me. It's about being fit for life
en_quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

en_quotes.quote: You gotta have a body
en_quotes.author: Jayne Mansfield

en_quotes.quote: The only weights I lift are my dogs
en_quotes.author: Olivia Newton-John

en_quotes.quote: My weight fluctuates depending on my mood and my current devotion to my fitness routine
en_quotes.author: Lena Dunham

en_quotes.quote: I am concentrating on my fitness levels so that I don't look old
en_quotes.author: Sonu Nigam

en_quotes.quote: I am confident in myself and about my fitness
en_quotes.author: Radamel Falcao

en_quotes.quote: One of my assets is my fitness. My fitness around the net and my movement: that's my defense to the power
en_quotes.author: Cara Black

en_quotes.quote: I was excited 'Maxim' wanted me to be in Expert Fitness
en_quotes.author: Bobby Lashley

en_quotes.quote: If I am at 100 percent fitness, I do not fear any competition for places in the first 11
en_quotes.author: Lukas Podolski

en_quotes.quote: My fitness is good. I hope to improve it even further during training
en_quotes.author: Andriy Shevchenko

en_quotes.quote: I think it's more important to be fit so that you can be healthy and enjoy activities than it is to have a good body
en_quotes.author: Rachel Blanchard

en_quotes.quote: I do yoga, I do Bikram and I run, and I eat really healthy
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: In the British Special Air Service, combat fitness is all about running
en_quotes.author: Bear Grylls

en_quotes.quote: I tell my sons all the time, 'The most important thing in your life is fitness,' but a lot of fighters go overboard
en_quotes.author: George Foreman

en_quotes.quote: What makes me relaxed is the fact that I know I've put in a lot of time during the offseason on my fitness
en_quotes.author: Naomi Osaka

en_quotes.quote: My morning starts with some form of exercise, and I give two hours - from 5:30 to 7:30 A.M. - to my personal fitness
en_quotes.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

en_quotes.quote: For a while after college, I was thinking of becoming a fitness trainer, and I am a certified aqua trainer
en_quotes.author: Dylan Lauren

en_quotes.quote: I have a tremendous passion for fitness, I love challenges and I am a very driven guy
en_quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

en_quotes.quote: Being disciplined and determined are my fitness mantra
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: The desire for fitness comes naturally to me
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: In Sevens, fitness is crucial, and it's going to come down to how quickly my body gets in shape
en_quotes.author: Nick Cummins

en_quotes.quote: I feel if I'm healthy and happy, I look good. With a good mixture of fitness and healthy food I always feel great!
en_quotes.author: Candice Swanepoel

en_quotes.quote: I've been into exercise my whole life, been a runner and been into health and fitness always
en_quotes.author: Sissy Spacek

en_quotes.quote: Never hurry. Take plenty of exercise. Always be cheerful. Take all the sleep you need. You may expect to be well
en_quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

en_quotes.quote: While I've got my health and fitness, I'm available... except for panto, of course. Too bloody much like hard work
en_quotes.author: David Jason

en_quotes.quote: I'm still very professional about my fitness. I stay in trim as I always did
en_quotes.author: Peter Shilton

en_quotes.quote: There are similarities between business and sport, in the pressures involved and in the fitness aspect too
en_quotes.author: Peter Shilton

en_quotes.quote: What I do is I'm trying to bridge the gap between yoga and fitness
en_quotes.author: Mandy Ingber

en_quotes.quote: Once you are over 30, 35 years old, I think everyone should get down to the gym and start moving again
en_quotes.author: Warren Cuccurullo

en_quotes.quote: The health industry, the fitness industry, was really starting to pick up. This was around the mid 80's
en_quotes.author: Warren Cuccurullo

en_quotes.quote: I became a fitness fiend when I was about 17 or 18
en_quotes.author: Cynthia Erivo

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a fitness model; I'm just a singer. If people focus on that, that's what I care about
en_quotes.author: Alessia Cara

en_quotes.quote: I focus on how to improve my fitness level
en_quotes.author: Jasprit Bumrah

en_quotes.quote: My bottom is so big it's got its own gravitational field
en_quotes.author: Carol Vorderman

en_quotes.quote: I have to thank the coach for looking after my fitness and allowing me to feel my way into the tournament
en_quotes.author: Bastian Schweinsteiger

en_quotes.quote: I never stop working when I'm on stage, and that's my fitness
en_quotes.author: Jessie J

en_quotes.quote: My fitness has always been decent. I run constantly
en_quotes.author: Wilfried Zaha

en_quotes.quote: We spend millions on fitness each year, yet we seem to get fatter
en_quotes.author: Mary Pilon

en_quotes.quote: Because I take care of my body, it doesn't look like the body of a woman of my years
en_quotes.author: Gloria Swanson

en_quotes.quote: At the beginning of the season, you're still getting your fitness levels up, and those first few games are quite tough
en_quotes.author: Aaron Ramsey

en_quotes.quote: When I do get time, I like to hike and I take lots of vitamins and powders to keep healthy
en_quotes.author: Catherine Bell

en_quotes.quote: I've been into fitness since I was 13
en_quotes.author: Ginger Zee

en_quotes.quote: I get in the gym and put the work in with the fitness coaches so I can be the best shape I can be in
en_quotes.author: Jordan Henderson

en_quotes.quote: I do a bit of boxing in the off-season to stay fit - it's a different kind of fitness
en_quotes.author: Nikita Parris

en_quotes.quote: I am pleased with the fitness that I have
en_quotes.author: Lin Dan

en_quotes.quote: The love for fitness is something I picked up from my dad, and I make it a point not to miss working out
en_quotes.author: Naga Chaitanya

en_quotes.quote: So I've broadened the fitness concept to make it one of moderation and balance
en_quotes.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

en_quotes.quote: Everyone here at Milan knows that my physical fitness is among the best in the squad; I always stand out in the tests
en_quotes.author: Rivaldo

en_quotes.quote: I have been passionate about fitness from a very young age
en_quotes.author: Varun Dhawan

en_quotes.quote: Fitness gives you confidence, and if you're fit, you don't have to wonder whether you'll last the 90 minutes
en_quotes.author: Niko Kovac

en_quotes.quote: One needs to be clear headed. I believe in all-round fitness
en_quotes.author: Gautam Gambhir

en_quotes.quote: I didn't have the same fitness or ability as the other girls, so I had to beat them with my mind
en_quotes.author: Martina Hingis

en_quotes.quote: When I was younger, my food and fitness were less controlled - I just loved football
en_quotes.author: Alex Scott

en_quotes.quote: I think a basic level of fitness can help the body cope with all manner of incidents
en_quotes.author: Richard Hammond

en_quotes.quote: Fitness, for me doesn't mean a bikini body or a size zero. I just strive to be and feel healthy
en_quotes.author: Radhika Pandit

en_quotes.quote: I'm enjoying myself this year and for once I'm not chasing my fitness
en_quotes.author: Jamie Redknapp

en_quotes.quote: Pole dancing is a great way to enhance your fitness level and also your dancing abilities
en_quotes.author: Kriti Kharbanda

en_quotes.quote: Dancing improved my fitness level and endurance
en_quotes.author: Hazel Keech

en_quotes.quote: For me, fitness is a lifetime commitment; I don't remember ever being out of shape
en_quotes.author: Urijah Faber

en_quotes.quote: My fitness is one area I've never had questioned in my career
en_quotes.author: Emmanuel Adebayor

en_quotes.quote: If you can do a squat and a pushup, you can build up to becoming a fitness guru
en_quotes.author: John Morrison

en_quotes.quote: I'm not a fitness buff
en_quotes.author: Caroline Flack

en_quotes.quote: The best fitness tip is that you don't need to be out of breath and do cardio to get in shape
en_quotes.author: Caroline Flack

en_quotes.quote: I like exercise. I like a healthy body
en_quotes.author: Erin Gray

en_quotes.quote: I don't believe in looking like a mannequin. I like my bulges and love handles, but fitness is important for me
en_quotes.author: Parvathy

en_quotes.quote: What you want is to rev up your metabolism so that you are burning fat and calories, not preserving fat and calories
en_quotes.author: Kathy Freston

en_quotes.quote: Being a fitness enthusiast, I try to stay away from overindulgence. I make sure my family eats healthy, too
en_quotes.author: Sonali Bendre

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else, but it is about being better than what you used to be!
en_quotes.author: Nikita Dutta

en_quotes.quote: I might do a fitness video. Actually, more of a fatness video
en_quotes.author: Sanjeev Bhaskar

en_quotes.quote: I was really into fitness
en_quotes.author: Mikhail Varshavski

en_quotes.quote: Overall, I think I'm in pretty good shape, but I'm not really someone that is gung-ho or a fitness fanatic
en_quotes.author: Cobi Jones

en_quotes.quote: I'm 33 now and I seem to have hit a fitness plane. Shifting the wobbly bits isn't as easy as it used to be
en_quotes.author: Matthew Rhys

en_quotes.quote: My first love is football. When I get the chance, I play football for fitness
en_quotes.author: Fidel Edwards

en_quotes.quote: I would rather exercise than read a newspaper
en_quotes.author: Kim Alexis

en_quotes.quote: I'm freakishly competitive, so I set a date to achieve a certain weight or fitness
en_quotes.author: Jamie Bamber

en_quotes.quote: Yoga's an amazing release
en_quotes.author: Monica Keena

en_quotes.quote: I love to swim for miles; I could just go back and forth
en_quotes.author: Jill Clayburgh

en_quotes.quote: Shearer could be at 100 per cent fitness, but not peak fitness
en_quotes.author: Graham Taylor

en_quotes.quote: When I'm on the road, I'll break my exercise into a cardio session and a weights session
en_quotes.author: Robert Irvine

en_quotes.quote: For exercise, I now run with my chocolate Lab puppy, Oscar
en_quotes.author: Daniela Pestova

en_quotes.quote: I concentrate on exercises from the waist down, since that is the laziest part of a woman's body
en_quotes.author: Tina Louise

en_quotes.quote: I love Nautilus and stretching. The results are immediate, and that gives me the motivation to continue
en_quotes.author: Donna Dixon

en_quotes.quote: My Daddy liked physical fitness and wanted me to be a prizefighter
en_quotes.author: Judy Johnson
